name: Nikolaus The Observer
description:
Nicholas is one of The Seven Clerics.

Seven Clerics is a fictional group led by Elias The Torch to purge the darkness and banish all the undead back to their realm. Nicholas is a new member to the group. He is the observer. He doesn't have a special ability to damage enemy but he is gifted with intelligence and fortune. He can obtain a lot of useful informations for the group and remain undetected from the enemies.
